s.text: So CEOs are now going to tell us when they're erectilely dysfunctional?

This week, things brightened slightly, for no obvious reason aside from excellent earnings from bellwethers Cisco (a holding of mine) and Wal-Mart (which I don't own but probably should) and a general sense that the market was "oversold."
It's a great business when you can borrow money with no intention of paying it back."
To the chagrin of many and the joy of at least a few, Cocktail Chatter returns after a two-week absence, which God knows I hope made your hearts grow fonder.
